## Privacy Preference Center

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. [More information](https://www.revmed.com/privacy-policy)

Allow All

###  Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Performance Cookies

Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Functional Cookies

Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Targeting Cookies

Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

Back Button

links.title: Investor FAQs
links.content:
[Skip to content](#lfg-main-content)

# Investor FAQs

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/logo-outline.svg)

Where is Revolution Medicines' corporate headquarters? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

Revolution Medicines’ corporate headquarters office is located at 700 Saginaw Drive, Redwood City, CA 94063 

When was Revolution Medicines founded? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

Revolution Medicines was founded in 2014. 

Where is Revolution Medicines incorporated? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

Revolution Medicines, Inc. is incorporated under the laws of the State of Delaware. 

Where is Revolution Medicines’ common stock listed and what is the ticker symbol? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

Revolution Medicines is listed on The Nasdaq Global Select Market under the ticker symbol RVMD. 

When did Revolution Medicines become a public company? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

Revolution Medicines, Inc. began trading on the Nasdaq Global Select Market on February 13, 2020. 

When does Revolution Medicines’ fiscal year end? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

Revolution Medicines’ fiscal year end is December 31. 

How can I purchase shares of Revolution Medicines’ common stock? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

Revolution Medicines does not currently have a direct stock purchase plan for investors. Revolution Medicines’ stock may be purchased through a licensed securities broker. 

Does Revolution Medicines pay dividends? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

Revolution Medicines, Inc. does not pay dividends. 

Who is Revolution Medicines' transfer agent and how do I contact them? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

American Stock Transfer & Trust Company, LLC 6201 15th Avenue Brooklyn, NY 11219 

Who do I contact regarding questions or changes to my stock certificates (including updating a mailing address, replacing my lost stock certificates, etc.)? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

For matters related to stock certificates, please contact Revolution Medicines’ transfer agent:

American Stock Transfer & Trust Company, LLC 6201 15th Avenue Brooklyn, NY 11219

How can I view documents Revolution Medicines has filed with the Securities & Exchange Commission (SEC), including Forms 10-K and 10-Q? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

You can visit the SEC Filings section of Revolution Medicines’ Investor Relations website or directly from the SEC’s website at <https://www.sec.gov>. 

How can I sign up to receive Revolution Medicines' press releases and other company information? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

You can visit the Email Alerts section of Revolution Medicines’ Investor Relations website. 

Who are Revolution Medicines’ independent auditors? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP 448 Almaden Blvd, Suite #1800 San Jose, CA 95110 

Who are Revolution Medicines’ outside legal counsel? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

Latham & Watkins LLP 140 Scott Drive Menlo Park, CA 94025 

Who should I contact with additional questions? 

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb88216/themes/site/client_site_202/client/assets/img/down-arrow.svg)

Please email Investor Relations at IR@revmed.com for assistance with other questions
